name:
Music on:
Learning Piano
description:
Bravissimo!The entire orchestra
follows your performance of 15 great
classics. By playing each day, your
ability increases and your memory
improves without effort.Earn the
bronze, silver and gold medals for
each song, completing all different
levels.A simplified music score is
shown on the upper screen and a full
piano keyboard on the touch screen,
guiding beginners note by note on
their first steps.
